    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line(double x1,
            double y1,
            double x2,
            double y2,
            double strokeWeight,
            java.awt.Color strokeColor)
        Creates a line object
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of first point of line
        y1 - y coordinate of first point of line
        x2 - x coordinate of second point of line
        y2 - y coordinate of second point of line
        strokeWeight - is the thickness of the line
        strokeColor - is the color of the line

    • Method Detail

        public void setPoint2(double x2,
                      double y2)
        sets the second point of the line
        Parameters:
        x2 - x coordinate that the line's point is being set to
        y2 - y coordinate that the line's point is being set to

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        draws a line
        Parameters:
        drawer - is the PApplet processing library that is used to draw the line
        Precondition:Â 
        drawer cannot be null

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Line other)
        checks to see if segments intersect each other
        Parameters:
        other - is the line that is being checked to see if it intersects with another line
        Returns:
        true if segments intersect, false if they don't
